author: Krystle Matar
description:

author: Meghan Leger
description:
In most science fiction, I am equal parts amused and intrigued by the technology that shapes the world on the page. At times I find myself too easily scoffing at the unbelievable capabilities described. A ship that can generate electricity from the beating of waves on its hull?
